member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.Action.AutoAttackBehaviour
member.summary: 0 = no effect on auto attacks, 1 = typical cast (unsheathe weapon, but don't touch autos), 2 = typical weaponskill (unsheathe, start autos if action target is primary target), 3 = sleep-like effect (unsheathe, stop autos), 4 = typical point-blank aoe (unsheathe, start autos if primary target is within action range), 5 = ??? (doesn't touch weapon state), 6 = typical channeled action (unsheathe, stop autos, do not auto-face target), 7 = force sheathe and stop autos, 8 = ??? (unused)

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.Action.EquivalenceGroup
member.summary: set for eg crafting actions, when different jobs have different rows, but they need to be considered interchangeable

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.Action.DeadTargetBehaviour
member.summary: 0 = can not target dead, 1 = can only target dead players (+ some other conditions), 2 = ???

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.ClassJobActionUI.ComboTreeLayout
member.summary: Used to position the action within a combo tree diagram. Non-zero digits identify branches within the combo (eg, Hakaze -> Shifu -> Kasha is 100 -> 120 -> 121)

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.ClassJobActionUI.GroupedCell
member.summary: Currently only used for MNK actions; displays a set of actions in a shared rectangular cell instead of a tree.

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.Condition.LogMessagePriority
member.summary: The lower this number is, the higher the priority. Used to determine which conditions LogMessage should be printed.

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.Condition.IsNetworked
member.summary: Allows this Condition to be set by a packet received from the server.

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.ExVersion.MenuScreen
member.summary: Equivalent to the last quest in column 6 of ScenarioTree

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.IndividualWeather.IndividualWeatherDataStruct.Unknown0
member.summary: quest progress maybe

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.MKDData.Unknown8
member.summary: Minimum Knowledge Level?

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.Quest.DailyQuestPool
member.summary: 1/2 - normal daily beast tribe quests, 3 - 'exclusive' (if player's rank is not greater than max rank requirement of quests offered by npc, exactly one of the available quests will be from this pool)

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.Role.Type
member.summary: 1 = Tank, 2 = DPS, 3 = Healer

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.SatisfactionSupplyReward.MinLevelForSecondReward
member.summary: 0 == current cap

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.SpecialShop.RequiredContentFinderConditionComplete
member.summary: If this is true, then the CFC needs to be completed; If this is false, then the CFC just needs to be unlocked

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.Status.Flags
member.summary: actually an index of the flag

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.TerritoryIntendedUse.GayaSoundId
member.summary: Ambient noise of people talking in a crowd. Values: 0 = None, 1 = sound/strm/GAYA_LestArea_01.scd, 2 = sound/strm/GAYA_Village_01.scd

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.TerritoryIntendedUse.EnableCompanion
member.summary: Enables summoning Chocobo Companion

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.TerritoryIntendedUse.EnablePets
member.summary: Enables summoning Summoner/Scholar pets

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.TerritoryIntendedUse.Unknown21
member.summary: Related to Map in Island Sanctuary, Cosmic Exploration

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.TerritoryIntendedUse.Unknown31
member.summary: Related to Idle Cam filtering EventNpcs/EventObjs??

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.TerritoryIntendedUse.Unknown41
member.summary: Related to blocking Say/Yell/Shout in Eureka/Bozja/Unknown61??

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.TradeScreenImage.BannerType
member.summary: 1 = Icon 180096 ("Excellent Trade!"), 2 = Icon 180097 ("Feat Accomplished!")

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.VVDData.Series
member.summary: RowId of VVDRouteData and VVDNotebookSeries

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.WeeklyBingoMultipleOrder.Content
member.summary: I *think* this is correct? You're welcome MidoriKami :3

member.name: P:Lumina.Excel.Sheets.ZoneSharedGroup.RequirementType
member.summary: 1 = Quest 2 = Quest with specific Sequence 3 = AetherCurrent 4 = EurekaStoryProgress 5 = DomaStoryProgress
